participant_1.background:

My most valuable thing is the sense of accomplishment I get from making something special with my own hands.
i want a dog , but that is a lot of commitment.
my favorite book is ender s game.

every fall i visit my sister in canada.

I went camping with my family at a lake and we all had a great time swimming, hiking and roasting marshmallows over the campfire.
I eat fruits like apples and bananas for their natural sweetness.

content.text: Hey there! What's your favorite book?
Ender's game is my favorite book! What about you?
That's awesome! It's one of my favorites too!
Have you read any other Orson Scott Card books?
Not yet, but I've heard good things about them.
You should definitely check them out! They're all really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
Do you have any pets?
Not yet, but my fiance and I are planning to get a dog soon.
That's great! What kind of dog do you want?
We're not sure yet. We're still doing research.
Well, I hope you find the perfect dog for you!
Thanks!
What do you do for fun?
I'm in gymnastics. I also like to go camping with my family.
That's awesome! I've never been camping before.
You should definitely try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem!
